Header.title: Helping you achieve optimal health, your way.
Header.leftContent: Health is a journey and you hold the power to biohack your way to your best life. This site is dedicated to my work as a Naturopathic Doctor, Entrepreneur, Educator and Formulator.
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

About.paragraph: I grew up in a naturopathic household and have always been fascinated by what our bodies are capable of. I believe that given the right support our bodies have amazing potential to maintain function (even as we age), recover from injury and allow us to lead empowered and fulfilling lives. This belief caused me to create one of the first comprehensive Biohacking programs in Canada at my clinic Integrative Naturopathic Medical Centre. It also drives my work as a formulator of Hidrate, a natural electrolyte drink company I co-founded with my husband, supplement designer and health educator.

Capability.paragraph: I grew up in a naturopathic household and have always been fascinated by what our bodies are capable of. I believe that given the right support our bodies have amazing potential to maintain function (even as we age), recover from injury and allow us to lead empowered and fulfilling lives. This belief caused me to create one of the first comprehensive Biohacking programs in Canada at my clinic Integrative Naturopathic Medical Centre. It also drives my work as a formulator of Hidrate, a natural electrolyte drink company I co-founded with my husband, supplement designer and health educator.
Capability.leftContent: Take charge of your health potential and harness the latest technology to optimize your genetics and overall well-being.
Capability.middleContent: Understand how disease impacts your whole-body and better manage contributing biochemical, structural and mental emotional factors.
Capability.rightContent: High demand results in high impact on your physical body. Customize your training and recovery to surpass your goals.

Blog.leftContent: I’ve been experimenting lately with gluten-free baking. In particular aiming for a good morning muffin that is gluten, dairy and sugar free but still delicious.
Blog.middleContent: Understand how disease impacts your whole-body and better manage contributing biochemical, structural and mental emotional factors.
Blog.rightContent: As a doctor I want to empower people to make change in their life that opens the door to optimal health.
Blog.rightTitle: How I Become A Naturopathic Doctor

Workwithme.headerContent: I work with patients in my office practice at Integrative. I also consult for companies regarding product development, present at conferences and write about functional health and naturopathic medicine.
Workwithme.element01Content: I enjoy working directly with patient’s in clinic at Integrative. I have a passion for chronic disease management including cancer care and treating those affected by Lyme and co-infections. Seeing those who have been chronically ill highlights the importance of early intervention and preventative medicine and so I have turned to focusing on how to optimize health and Biohack to prevent disease occurrence and promote vitality.
Workwithme.element02Content: I am proud to be a co-founder of Hidrate the first natural electrolyte drink formulated by a Naturopathic Doctor. Dehydration and a distaste for water is a major issue in North America and I felt a need to bring a healthy electrolyte drink to market. Using the cleanest ingredients and best forms of electrolytes Hidrate has exactly the electrolytes, trace minerals, and nutrients you need without added chemicals.
Workwithme.element03Content: Sharing my knowledge and experience is important to me and I look to do this through speaking engagements, writing and consulting. At Integrative I am the clinic’s Residency Program Director which helps to train new naturopathic graduates. I have also spoken at professional conferences on Biohacking and consulted with various companies working towards supplement and product development.

Review.content1: Dr. Alex continuously pushes herself to learn, so she can be the best doctor for her patients. Her philosophy embodies the core foundations of naturopathy while integrating science based technology and techniques into her practice.
Review.content2: She's one of those rare people that makes you feel better just for having spent time with her. She is completely invested, infinitely capable, and smart. She is one of the most humble human beings I know
Review.content3: I've worked with Alex as both a client and a patient. Whether she is building a business for her customers or working with her patients, she brings the same level of dedication, care, and attention. She is an insanely talented doctor, entrepreneur, and formulator.

Hero.title: Health is a delicate balance between your biochemistry, structure and mental/emotional needs.
Hero.content: Each of us has a story that has brought us to this point where we are seeking for more from our body and mind. Read more about my story as a Biohacker, science nerd and passionate Naturopathic Doctor.

Story.title: Hi I'm Dr. Alex Chan
Story.subtitle: MY STORY
Story.content: My journey towards alternative health care is unique as I was born into a family of health practitioners: my mom is a Registered Massage Therapist and my dad is an Acupuncturist, Chiropractor and Naturopathic Doctor. I knew from a young age that I respect the wisdom of the body and believe that with the right tools we can promote self-healing. Becoming a Naturopathic Physician was a logical step as on this path I felt I could best serve people along their own personal discovery of health. I have a particular interest in how naturopathic philosophy can work alongside conventional care to provide the best medial care. With this integrated and complementary approach, I’m drawn to common chronic conditions like heart disease and type II diabetes, as well as autoimmune conditions and chronic infections like Lyme and associate co-infections. I’m also particularly passionate about cancer care. Cancer is a growing epidemic that affects 1 in 3 people in North American society. Personally cancer has affected too many members of my family including the early loss of my grandmother in her 50s and my dad’s personal journey during his teens. Many people have watched loved ones battle with cancer diagnoses and wished there was something they could do beyond the conventional treatment that is delivered. To this end, I have sought out specific training to work with cancer patients and use natural supplements, IV therapy and nutrition as needed to address cancer and the side effects from conventional therapy.Seeing the toll that chronic disease takes on the body highlighted my belief in early health intervention. Instead of only focusing on those with chronic disease I have also devoted attention towards athletic and health optimization. The tools I use to help patients achieve peak performance address three main aspects of health: biochemical, structural, and mental/emotional. If this triad is taken care of it allows people to function at their best. I’m excited to be a part of the Biohacking world and apply various hacks in my patient recommendations and my own life. I also am well versed in sports nutrition and in particular Paleo and ketogenic diets. This knowledge led me to co-found an electrolyte drink company with my husband and I’m proud that we make Hidrate, the best healthy hydration option available.

Experience.title: EXPERIENCE
content3: College of Naturopathic Physicians of BC

Workproduct.subtitle: How can i help you
Workproduct.title: Let's work together
Workproduct.content: I work with patients in my office practice at Integrative. I also consult for companies regarding product development, present at conferences and write about functional health and naturopathic medicine.

Hero.title: Bringing you science based health updates, recipes and thoughts on wellness.
Hero.content: Through my life I strive to walk the walk. Here you’ll find personal glimpses into my lifestyle and kitchen as well as my professional opinion on some of the most relevant functional medicine topics.

Blog.title: GF Chocolate Coconut Mandarin Muffins
Blog.content: I’ve been experimenting lately with gluten-free baking. In particular aiming for a good morning muffin that is gluten, dairy and sugar free but still delicious.

Blog.title: How I Become A Naturopathic Doctor
Blog.content: As a doctor I want to empower people to make change in their life that opens the door to optimal health.

Blog.title: Incorporating mindfulness into your life
Blog.content: The practice of mindfulness is an age old concept but in the last several years I’ve seen an increase in its popularity.

Blog.title: Our attachments to food
Blog.content: So much of life is about moderation-what’s good in one quantity can be insignificant or deadly in a different amount.

Hero.title: The prospect of creating something new fills me with excitement.
Hero.content: My education and professional experience has given me a unique perspective on the health, fitness and food industries. I share my expertise daily with my patients but also love to use them through consulting and speaking engagements.

Element.subtitle: WORK WITH ME
Element.title: Develop a product together
Element.content: Product design and new business opportunities are always exciting. Through development of Hidrate I have gained experience in how to bring specific ingredients, nutritional and health formulas into the food and beverage space. I also have worked with other companies on supplement development to create the most effective products. If you have a product idea that you are interested in developing please inquire on how my expertise can help

Element.subtitle: WORK WITH ME
Element.title: Book a Naturopathic appointment
Element.content: Let me help you on your health journey. I am accepting new patients through my practice at Integrative. If you are interesting in Biohacking, chronic disease/infection management or improving your overall health with an integrated and functional medicine approach I would love to meet you

Element.subtitle: WORK WITH ME
Element.title: Book me as a speaker
Element.content: Representing naturopathic medicine is fundamental to me. If you are interested in having me speak at an upcoming event or contribute as a writer or panelist please contact me with the details of the proposed partnership.

Footer.content: * This website offers health and wellness information and is provided for educational purposes only. This is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always speak with your physician or other healthcare provider before taking any medication or supplement, changing your diet/lifestyle or using any treatment for a medical concern. Do not disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking medical care because of something you have read on this website.
